definition: capable of being treated as fact
details:
adjective
- capable of being treated as fact
= example: capable of being treated as fact
= synonyms: real
- capable of being perceived
= synonyms: palpable
- perceptible by the senses especially the sense of touch
= example: perceptible by the senses especially the sense of touch
= synonyms: touchable
- having physical substance and intrinsic monetary value, of especially business assets
= example: having physical substance and intrinsic monetary value, of especially business assets
